input: Point out the difference between the local government in India before and after the Constitutional Amendments in 1992: P. It has become mandatory to hold regular elections to the local government bodies. Q. 1/3rd positions are reserved for women. R. Elected officials exercise supreme power in the government. Select the correct answer using the code given below.
explanation: There is a provision of reservation of seats for SCs, STs and Women at every level of Panchayat. Out of the total number of seats to be filled by the direct elections, 1/3rd have to be reserved for women.
